product_name: JetBlack Cycling Z1 Pro Fluid Bike Trainer
long_description: The Z1 Pro Fluid incorporates one of the heaviest stock flywheels on the market, resulting in seriously realistic on-road feel for effective indoor training when you can't ride outside.
short_description: The Z1 Pro Fluid incorporates one of the heaviest stock flywheels on the market, resulting in seriously realistic on-road feel for effective indoor training when you can't ride outside.
